metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13742 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a stack-based buffer overflow in Liblouis 3.2.0, triggered in the function includeFile() in compileTranslationTable.c, that will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblouis package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.4-2ubuntu0.1').
